short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly fact-check tweets on X/Twitter with AI. Stay informed and verify what you read!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Community Notes lets you fact-check any tweet you see on X/Twitter instantly with the help of AI. Our tool is designed to help you stay informed and ensure the information you come across is accurate. Just click the fact-check button next to any tweet, and get a quick, reliable fact-check summary. 

You are currently only allowed to fact check 5 tweets per day.
